00007 #include "Solenoid.h"

00012 void Solenoid::InitSolenoid()
00013 {
00014     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00015     {
00016         CheckSolenoidChannel(m_channel);
00017         Resource::CreateResourceObject(&m_allocated, tSolenoid::kNumDO7_0Elements * kSolenoidChannels);
00018     
00019         m_allocated->Allocate(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot) * kSolenoidChannels + m_channel - 1);
00020     }
00021 }
00022 
00028 Solenoid::Solenoid(UINT32 channel)
00029     : SolenoidBase (GetDefaultSolenoidModule())
00030     , m_channel (channel)
00031 {
00032     InitSolenoid();
00033 }
00034 
00041 Solenoid::Solenoid(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00042     : SolenoidBase (slot)
00043     , m_channel (channel)
00044 {
00045     InitSolenoid();
00046 }
00047 
00051 Solenoid::~Solenoid()
00052 {
00053     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00054     {
00055         m_allocated->Free(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot) * kSolenoidChannels + m_channel - 1);
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00064 void Solenoid::Set(bool on)
00065 {
00066     UINT8 value = on ? 0xFF : 0x00;
00067     UINT8 mask = 1 << (m_channel - 1);
00068 
00069     SolenoidBase::Set(value, mask);
00070 }
00071 
00077 bool Solenoid::Get()
00078 {
00079     UINT8 value = GetAll() & ( 1 << (m_channel - 1));
00080     return (value != 0);
00081 }
